mapper.select: SELECT b.id as bookId, b.title as title, b.author as author, b.price as price, b.publisher as publisher, b.publish_date as publishDate, b.description as `description`, b.stock as stock, b.isbn as isbn, b.image_path as imagePath, if(exists (select 0 from favorite_book fb where fb.user_id = #{userId} and fb.book_id = #{bookId}), true, false) as isFavorite, round(price*0.03, 0) as bronzeMileage, round(price*0.05, 0) as silverMileage, round(price*0.07, 0) as goldMileage,round(price*0.1, 0) as diamondMileage, avg(r.score) as score FROM book b left join review r on b.id = r.book_id where b.id = #{bookId} group by isbn;
